name: released
description: Keep up with new music from your favorite labels ðŸ“¡

scripts.test:labels: cd functions && node -e "require('.').searchLabels({ query: { search: process.argv[1] } }, { set: () => {}, status: () => ({ send: r => console.log(r) }) })"
scripts.test:latest: cd functions && node -e "require('.').searchLabels({ query: { label: process.argv[1] } }, { set: () => {}, status: () => ({ send: r => console.log(r) }) })"
scripts.deploy:functions: cd functions && gcloud functions deploy searchLabels --region=europe-west1 --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-http
